page.text: You have defeated the mushroom girl, her little body slumped before you
You have devoured her in some unspecified, unelaborated on yet satisfying way.

Slightly teary eyed, she gazes at you as you try your best to smile at her, before grabbing her mushroom cap with both hands and closing it over her head like an umbrella. You forcefully swallow a few more times and finally send her on her way to your stomach. LBREAK Her mushroom cap flares out in your throat, almost causing you to choke, and definitely forcing you to take a few large gulps. It proves no problem though, eventually it slowly slides down and the mushroom girl is forced to curl up in your stomach. You give a contented sigh as your snack squirms inside you, still not fully ready to accept her place within your stomach, though your stomach is fully accepting of her. You smile and rub your belly as the gurgles and groans begin to overpower the squirms and struggles. The shapes and bulges in your belly soften out and form a single curve before even that gradually shrinks away. You lick your lips in a final attempt to get the last of the mushroom girl's flavor before continuing on your journey.
